returns.outcomeIndex: The index of the outcome (new or existing)

params.creator: The address of the market creator (for factory pattern)
params.initialOutcomeLabel: The initial outcome label - for CrowdWisdom markets (empty string if Binary)
params.initialSide: The side the creator is predicting (Yes or No) - for Binary markets
params.initialStake: The amount the creator must stake
params.marketType: The type of market (Binary or CrowdWisdom)
params.question: The prediction question

returns.marketId: The ID of the created market

returns.poolAmounts: Array of total staked per outcome

commentAndStake(uint256,string,uint256).notice: Comment and stake on CrowdWisdom market (creates outcome if new, stakes if exists)

getMarketOutcomes(uint256).notice: Get all outcomes for a CrowdWisdom market

resolveCrowdWisdom(uint256,uint256).notice: Resolve CrowdWisdom market by outcome index

stakeOnOutcome(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Stake on existing outcome in CrowdWisdom market
